eventos

Interface LienzoListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LienzoAdapter

    public interface LienzoListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Interfaz LienzoListener. Hereda de EventListener. Permite la gestión de eventos del lienzo.
